data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cuccodoro, Giulio, Liu, Zhiping (2016): Megarthrus of southern India and Sri Lanka, with notes on their phylogenetic and biogeographical relationships (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Proteininae). Zootaxa 4097 (4): 530-544, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4097.4.5
